thread.title: ‘Tiger Woods’ Review: A Phenom’s Rise and Fall

author: Leigh Montville
title: ‘Tiger Woods’ Review: A Phenom’s Rise and Fall
text:
The Nike television ad was a stylish part of the public-relations explosion when Eldrick “Tiger” Woods moved from Stanford University onto the professional golf stage in the late summer of 1996. A guy named Jim Riswold put it together, soft music in the background, a string of children saying the same phrase, “I’m Tiger Woods.” 
“I’m Tiger Woods,” the African-American child said. 

“I’m...
